content: ```Star Citizen & RSI Website Frequently Asked Questions```

author.name: All information is compiled by our help staff volunteers

embeds.title: :warning: READ ME :warning:
embeds.description:
‚ÄúThis is an unofficial Star Citizen discord, not affiliated with the Cloud Imperium group of companies. All content on this site not authored by its host or users are property of their respective owners.‚Äù  [[1]](https://robertsspaceindustries.com/tos)

This discord server is not managed or staffed by Cloud Imperium Games (the company) or CIG employees, as such, any advice offered may be limited as our volunteers do not have access do your personal or account information.

**Do not ever give out your personal or account login information to anyone that asks, as none of it is required to properly troubleshoot any aspect of this game.**

Some account-related issues can only be resolved by [contacting RSI Support](https://support.robertsspaceindustries.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

embeds.description:
